column1: * 1955 – Harvey Breit writes an article on J.R.R. Tolkien in the New York Times Book Review. Breit tells of  "Dr. Tolkein"
column2: and contains many more errors. Tolkien sends Letter 165.

column1: * 1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien delivers the Valedictory Address to the University of Oxford.
* 1973 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to James A.H. Murray.
* 2003 - Andy Serkis wins the http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MTV_Movie_Awards MTV Movie Award for "Best Animated Character"
column2: for his role as Gollum. His http://youtube.com/watch?v=Uj411At8VRI immortal acceptance speech would win the 2004 wikipedia:Hugo Award for "Best Dramatic Presentation

column1: * 2004 - The Lord of the Rings Symphony at wikipedia:Atlanta Symphony Hall
